name: Psycholonials
description:
Chapter 1 of 9 is out now! Buying the visual novel once allows you to access all chapters without additional payment. When a new chapter becomes available, you will get it as DLC. Please check http://psycholonials.com/ for the release schedule for all chapters.

While in communication with supernatural forces, two influencers launch a daring new social media brand. After getting in trouble with the law, they must consider how to navigate stardom as scrutiny of their project intensifies. The visual novel begins on April 20th, 2020, taking place on an island off the coast of New England.

Suitable for adult audiences only.

Features include:
-The year 2020
-Island Living
-Influencers
-Ennui
-Clowns
-A Horse
-Internet Drama
-An expansive soundtrack
